name: Hammock the train slayer
description: The new and improved short adventure of "Hammock: The Train Slayer". Although if it's new, how can it be improved!?  Enough already!  Behold, graphic now included!  This was a quick test of Twine, where we had a conversation over Twitter, and that conversation was converted into a silly little game.  It's not particularly great, but more a proof of concept for ourselves.
